itunes:title: #59: Why They're Treating You the Way They're Treating You
title: #59: Why They're Treating You the Way They're Treating You
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: You were so in love, but things have changed.  Y'all were best friends, but now it feels like she betrayed you.  And while things change in relationships all of this time, this was one where you didn't expect it to be this way. It's totally...
itunes:summary:
You were so in love, but things have changed. 

Y'all were best friends, but now it feels like she betrayed you. 

And while things change in relationships all of this time, this was one where you didn't expect it to be this way. It's totally blind-sided you. 

In this episode, we're going to talk about why they're treating you the way they're treating you.
